workflow.name: Create a one-minute video from Telegram prompts with Veo 3 and Fal.ai
workflow.description:
# One-Minute VEO Video Generator  
## Automated, Consistent, High-Quality Short-Form Video Creation

This workflow turns a single Telegram prompt into a fully generated, visually consistent, one-minute video using **Veo 3**. It‚Äôs built for creators, agencies, and brands that want fast, scalable short-form content without sacrificing quality.

Whether you're posting on **YouTube Shorts**, **TikTok**, **Instagram Reels**, or need polished short ads, this automation gives you studio-level output on autopilot.

---

## üöÄ What This Workflow Does
The workflow listens for a specific Telegram message and instantly triggers a complete AI-powered production pipeline:

- Generates one minute of smooth, coherent video  
- Ensures visual consistency across all scenes  
- Saves all video assets in Google Drive  
- Uses public sharing links so FAL can reliably process and merge clips  
- Delivers the final result back to the user automatically

It‚Äôs your fully automated video studio ‚Äî no timeline editing, no manual rendering, no hassle.

---

## ‚ö° How to Use It

### **1 ‚Äî Send a Prompt to Telegram**
Message your bot with the trigger command, along with the topic for your video. Example:

> ‚Äú/makevideo Create a motivational video about resilience.‚Äù

This immediately starts the workflow.

### **2 ‚Äî Let AI Build Your One-Minute Video**
Using Veo 3, the system:
- Generates structured, consistent video scenes  
- Maintains coherent visuals from start to finish  
- Keeps pacing smooth and story flow intact  

You don't have to write a script or prompt multiple times ‚Äî everything is handled automatically.

### **3 ‚Äî Auto-Store Assets in Google Drive**
Each generated clip is uploaded into a public, designated Google Drive folder.  
This allows **FAL** to fetch and process the video URLs seamlessly during merging and final production.

### **4 ‚Äî Receive the Final Video**
Once complete, the workflow sends you the fully generated one-minute video directly in Telegram.  
You can save it, post it, or reuse it as needed.

---

## üìà Perfect For Fast Content Growth

### **Great For:**
- YouTube Shorts  
- TikTok  
- Instagram Reels  
- Facebook Reels  
- X video posts  
- Any short-form content platform  

### **Also Ideal For:**
- Short ads  
- Promo videos  
- B2B explainer clips  
- Training content  
- Course material intros  

Anywhere you need fast, consistent, high-quality video ‚Äî this workflow delivers.

---

## üéØ Summary
This workflow simplifies content creation to one step: **send a Telegram prompt**.  
Everything else ‚Äî generation, consistency, merging, hosting, delivery ‚Äî is fully automated.

If you want a reliable, scalable way to create one-minute videos for social growth or marketing, this automation is one of the most efficient systems you can deploy.

parameters.text: Video generation Complete! Please wait while they are combined.

## Fal

Fal.AI configuration:

Fal is an AI platform and we will be using their ffmpeg video combiner

nodes.name: Send message and wait for response

parameters.message:
LOOK AT THE MOST RECENT SPREADHSEET INPUT AND THEN REPLY WITH: "CONFIRM" OR "RETRY"

 (insert sheets link)

parameters.content:
## Notice

Depending on your google API level, you can only run this once or twicer per day before reaching a limit, If you need more, you can configure fal.ai nodes instead of gemani, although it is more expensive.

## How It Works

- This workflow creates a long-form video by combining multiple short clips into one final video  
- The process starts with a Telegram trigger  
  - You send a message containing a video idea or request  
  - The workflow immediately replies to confirm processing has started  
  - You are warned not to send additional messages until completion  
- An AI agent takes your input and generates:  
  - A full video script  
  - Seven detailed, independent video prompts  
- Prompts are structured to maintain visual and narrative continuity  
  - Each clip is generated separately but designed to flow together  
- Each prompt is sent to **Veo 3**  
  - Veo 3 generates one 8-second video clip per prompt  
- After each clip is created:  
  - It is uploaded to Google Drive  
  - The file is made publicly accessible  
  - Public URLs are required for Fal‚Äôs ffmpeg merge process  
- As clips finish generating, progress updates are sent to Telegram  
- Once all seven clips are ready:  
  - Their public URLs are merged using Fal‚Äôs video combining service  
  - The workflow periodically checks merge status until completion  
- The final output is a single video (~1 minute long)  
- When ready, the final video is sent directly back to you on Telegram  
- No automatic posting occurs  
  - The video is delivered for review, download, or manual distribution  

---

## Human in the Loop

- Human confirmation is required before video generation begins  
- Progress updates keep you informed during generation  
- Final output is reviewed manually  
- No auto-posting or auto-publishing is performed  

---

## Setup

- Create a Telegram bot using **BotFather**  
  - Connect it to n8n for message triggers and status updates  
- Enable the **Google Drive API**  
  - Configure credentials in n8n  
  - The upload folder must be public so Fal can access video URLs  
- (Optional) Enable the **Google Sheets API**  
  - Used to store generated scripts and prompts  
  - Allows manual review and confirmation before video creation  
- Enable the **Gemini** or **OpenAI API**  
  - Used by the AI agent for script writing and prompt generation  
- Create an account on **fal.ai**  
  - Generate an API key  
  - Enter it in n8n using the format:  
    - `Key YOUR_FAL_API_KEY`  
  - A minimum deposit is required  
  - Each workflow run costs only a fraction of a cent  
- No YouTube credentials are required  
  - This workflow does not post videos automatically

main.node: Send message and wait for response

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
